name: Strike Team Alpha
overview: Like the 1978 board game this video game Strike Team Alpha is a game set in the 22nd and 23rd centuries, which simulates tactical infantry combat between factions. A nice SEUCK Commando style game, featuring some nice graphics and clever game play implemented in SEUCK. The game is very tough to play, just like Strike Team 1 and 2. Features a brand new front end, with in game enhancements by Richard Bayliss.
